# homeUniqueIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The identifier corresponding to the home that the accessory should be added to when being set up.

## Declaration

```swift
var homeUniqueIdentifier: UUID? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If `nil`, then the user chooses a home. See [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHome/uniqueIdentifier] for more information.

## Setting up accessorices

- **payload**: The payload to use for accessory setup.
- **suggestedAccessoryName**: The name that the framework suggests when the user names the accessory being set up.
- **suggestedRoomUniqueIdentifier**: The identifier corresponding to the room that the framework suggests.
